title: Strawberry Lemonade

preparations.content: Place strawberries, sugar and lemon juice in mixing bowl then chop <b>Turbo/2 sec/4 times<b>. Strain through a sieve collecting strawberry purée in a bowl. Discard seeds in sieve.
Place ice cubes, lime wedges and mint leaves in a large jug then add sieved strawberry purée. Dilute by adding sparkling water. Mix well then serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Another very British drink for the summer – and an excellent way to make the most of British strawberries when they’re in season. This makes a beautifully refreshing drink, either diluted with sparkling water or served as a light cocktail with vodka and soda water.
